text: A park provides calm and peaceful atmosphere for the visitors.

üçÇA small green space within the Tanjong Pagar commercial area.
üçÇLocated next to the Orchid Hotel Singapore, the Tras Link Park is a welcome respite from the hustle and bustle of urban pace.
Very surprised a commercial area has turned into an amazing park. I had a beautiful day at the park.

The most underrated place to sit and enjoy the peaceful time here.
There are so many tallest buildings around the part that will make you astonished. It's a great place for a photoshoot and you will definitely find an open space.
The best thing about this place is that it is adjacent to the Tanjong Pagar (EW15) MRT station and that makes it quite easy to navigate here.
Sharing some pictures and a video below.
Thankful for green spaces like this. Makes cbd a greener place.
